title: One Piece Episode 345 Recap: "A Bunch of Animals? Perona's Wonder Garden"
author: [swim squad]
description: A detailed episode recap covering the major plot points, character interactions, and notable moments from Episode 345. Describes the episode as 'another good and funny episode' with emphasis on humor over intense action. Rated 4/5.

title: 345-346: "A Bunch of Animals? Perona's Wonder Garden!" and "The Vanishing Straw Hat Crew! A Mysterious Swordsman Appears!"
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A first-time viewer's analysis and reaction to episodes 345-346. The author expresses frustration with the scene, noting they found it difficult to believe Nami, Chopper or even Usopp would have a hard time fighting the zombie animals. Specifically criticized Chopper for neglecting to morph into his buff man-deer form.

title: One Piece: 5 Ways Thriller Bark Was Scary (& 5 It Was Silly)
author: CBR Editorial
description: An editorial article examining the dual nature of the Thriller Bark arc, analyzing both its horror elements and comedic aspects. Discusses how the arc balances scary zombie themes with One Piece's characteristic humor.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for entire Thriller Bark arc

title: One Piece – Thriller Bark Arc (Episodes 337 – 381) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the entire Thriller Bark arc, covering all episodes from 337 to 381. Provides detailed analysis of the arc's strengths, weaknesses, and overall contribution to the One Piece story.
